entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:54 a.m. EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 7.
